Episodes.Title: A Scarf for Percy
Episodes.Plot: Percy dreams of wearing a nice, warm scarf around his funnel to keep out the winter winds; what a surprise when his wish comes true.

Episodes.Title: Percy's Promise
Episodes.Plot: Percy encounters bad weather while taking the children home from Sunday School; when he passes through a flooded field and his fire goes out.

Episodes.Title: Time for Trouble
Episodes.Plot: Gordon is exhausted and James is given his work while he has a rest. James becomes more boastful than ever and brags about his importance to Toby, who is in need of repairs. Toby puffs away to the Works, but when he takes on water at Maron he is told to clear the path for James.

Episodes.Title: Gordon and the Famous Visitor
Episodes.Plot: It is an important day at the yards, and everyone is busy and excited making notes and taking photographs. A special visitor had arrived and was now the center of attention. Thomas, Duck, Percy and the other engines are very pleased about the Visitor, but Gordon is jealous as he thinks it's a lot of

Episodes.Title: Donald's Duck
Episodes.Plot: Duck and his crew play a trick on Donald by hiding a duck in his water tank.

Episodes.Title: Thomas Gets Bumped
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is late after taking some children home when their bus breaks down and Thomas is afraid he will be replaced. His fears amplify when the rails on his branch line buckle and he is sent to shunt in the yard while Bertie does his passenger work. But the Fat Controller adjusts Thomas' timetable so

Episodes.Title: Thomas, Percy and the Dragon
Episodes.Plot: Thomas fools Percy with a paper dragon.

Episodes.Title: Diesel Does It Again
Episodes.Plot: Percy and Duck are outraged when Diesel arrives at the harbor.

Episodes.Title: Henry's Forest
Episodes.Plot: Henry has lived on the Island of Sodor for many years and wouldn't want to be anywhere else. He likes every part of it, but there is one place that he enjoys visiting more than another, the forest. Henry remembers the day long ago when he and Toby had brought some new trees to be planted, and Terenc

Episodes.Title: The Trouble with Mud
Episodes.Plot: Gordon is covered with mud and messes up a newly washed James.

Episodes.Title: No Joke for James
Episodes.Plot: One morning, James is boasting to Thomas and Percy that he is the smartest and most useful engine on the line. Thomas disagrees and thinks that all of The Fat Controller's engines are useful, and Percy tells James that he's getting all puffed up.

Episodes.Title: Thomas, Percy and the Post Train
Episodes.Plot: Thomas and Percy have the important job of transporting the mail, but they are afraid that Harold will start stealing their traffic.

Episodes.Title: Trust Thomas
Episodes.Plot: Thomas finds out that Bertie has lost his trust in the railway's service after it failed to deliver tar to mend the roads and resolves to get to the source of the problem. Meanwhile, James is complaining about having to shunt when Gordon advises him to pretend to be sick.
